code: var connect=function connect(){var id=document.cookie.split("; ")[0].replace("id=","");var socketURL=new WebSocket(window.location.href.replace("http://","ws://")+id+"ws/");var socket=new WebSocket(socketURL);console.log("Attempting Connection...");socket.onopen=function(){console.log("Successfully Connected");};socket.onmessage=function(msg){console.log(msg);};socket.onclose=function(event){console.log("Socket Closed Connection: ",event);window.location.replace(window.location.href.replace("/game",""));};socket.onerror=function(error){console.log("Socket Error: ",error);};};export{connect};
